description: Pick your 'Well XI for season opener
title: Pick your 'Well XI for season opener
title_page: Pick your 'Well XI for season opener - BBC Sport
maintext:
Stuart Kettlewell's Motherwell side travel to Dundee for their opening league fixture of the new season, looking to carry forward their momentum from the end of the last campaign.
Tell us who you would pick to start at Dens Park here.
